import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Card.css'; // Assuming you have all the CSS in an external file. const Card = ({ type }) => { const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false); const handleFlip = () => { setIsFlipped(!isFlipped); }; return (
{type === 'darth' ? ( <>

Darth
Vader

Vader Image by 6Kart ) : ( <>

Luke
Skywalker

Luke Image by SalvadorTrakal )}
{type === 'darth' ? ( ) : ( )}
{type === 'darth' ? ( <> Once a heroic Jedi Knight, Darth Vader was seduced by the dark side of the Force... ) : ( <> Luke Skywalker was a Tatooine farmboy who rose from humble beginnings to become... )}
); }; export default Card;
